sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from "axios"; import Search from './Search' export default class UserInfo extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { user : [] } } componentDidMount = () => { axios.get('https://api.github.com/search/users', { params: { q: this.props.name } }).then(response => { this.setState({user : response.data.items}) console.log(this.state.user) }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }); } render() { const style = { } return (
Name:
{this.state.user.login}
Type:
{this.state.user.type}
Github Account Link:
My Github Acc
ID
{this.state.user.id}
Github Repository Link
My Github Repos
My Score:
{this.state.user.score}
) } }
